QuestData.Title: Chen's Resolution
QuestData.Description: You know what? I don't have to take this.$b$bI'll show that Uncle Gao what it means to be a real brewer. I'll brew the best beer he's ever tasted, with ingredients I've never even used before.$b$bI'm Chen Stormstout, and I'm the best brewer alive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at Halfhill.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
